mapper.select: select hu.unit_id chargeDeptId, hu.unit_name chargeDept from hpfm_unit hu LEFT JOIN hpfm_employee_assign hea ON hea.unit_id =hu.unit_id where hea.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and hea.employee_id = #{chargeId} order by hea.primary_position_flag desc
SELECT name as employeeName, employee_num as employeeNum FROM hpfm_employee he where he.employee_id=#{chargeId}
